name: Golden Strings
desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Etherlight Spindlelute."
In a civilization long lost to time, some believed the fate that governs the world was woven like a song upon the stage â€” birthed from the strings of a colossal harp suspended in the heavens. Perhaps it was because they had witnessed angels pluck golden strings from the very skies above, their divine chords proclaiming the thundering indifference of fate.
